text: "Miracle" is a 1991 song by Whitney Houston. It is the third single from her third studio album I'm Your Baby Tonight and was written and produced by L.A. Reid and Babyface. It went to number 9 in the United States and number 17 in Canada. == Track listing and formats == *;US, 7"Vinyl, Cassette single **A1 "Miracle" — 5:43 **B1 "After We Make Love" — 4:59 *Japan, CD Mini single # "Miracle" — 5:04 # "After We Make Love" — 4:59 *;Promo CD-Single # "Miracle" (Radio edit) — 4:29 ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul songs Category:Whitney Houston songs
title: Miracle (Whitney Houston song)
